Package org.drip.alm.dynamics

ALM Portfolio Allocation and Evolution
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetEvolver
    AssetEvolver implements the Monte Carlo Evolution of the Specified Asset.
    EvolutionDigest
    EvolutionDigest holds the generated Measures of a Portfolio Evolution.
    EvolvableAsset
    EvolvableAsset exposes a Matching and Evolvable ALM Asset and its Evolution.
    MatchingPortfolio
    MatchingPortfolio implements the Matching ALM Portfolio and its Evolution.
    MaturingAsset
    MaturingAsset implements the Dynamics of the Maturing Asset.
    NonMaturingAsset
    NonMaturingAsset implements the Dynamics of the Non-Maturing Asset.
    SpotMarketParameters
    SpotMarketParameters contains the Spot Market Parameters for the ALM Portfolio Evolution.
